attributes.action: lower the resuscitation guidelines of premature babies
attributes.additional_details: Did you know that if a baby is born before 24 weeks nothing will be done to help that baby survive?my son was born at 21 week's 5 days weighing 11 ounces he cried and moved he fought for 2 hours but no one would help him doctors and midwives just stood by and let my son die!!they youngest surviving premature baby was born at 20 week's because the mother lied and said she was further along than what she was doctor's intervened and That baby survived yet abortions are legal at 20week's!!something needs to be done to get the laws changed its murder leaving a breathing baby to die please sign the petition to have these guidelines reviewed
